Translations.Text: Wo ceng huimiele xuduo xing bu yi de chengshi [de minzhong], bing zai cihou chuangzaole bie de minzhong.
Mei dang tamen gandao wo de xingfa [jijiang jianglin] shi, tamen turan shitu taozou.
[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen buyao taozou, nimen huiqu xiangshou nimen de shechi shenghuo he haozhai ba! Yibian nimen shoushen wen.”
Tamen jiaohan shuo:“Women zhen gaisi! Women que shi bu yi zhe.”
Tamen de zhe zhong aiming bu hui zhongduan, zhidao wo shi tamen bian cheng haoxiang gang geguo de [zhuangjia] yiyang er xiaoshi.
Wo chuangzao tiandi wanwu, bingfei wei le yule.
Jiaru wo xiang xiaoqian [ru yongyou qi er deng], wo yiding hui zai wo zheli huode xiaoqian, jiaru wo yu zuo.
Bu, wo yi zhenli [“gulanjing”] huiji miuwu [bu xinyang deng], miuwu zao daole huimie, turan xiaoshile. Nimen [dui wo] niezao huangyan [ru wangyan an la you qi er] jiang zao yancheng zhen huogai!
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou shi ta de [an la]; fan zai ta nali de [tianshi], dou chongbai ta, tamen ji bu aoman, ye bu pijuan.
Tamen [tianshi] zhouye zansong ta, hao bu songxie.
Nandao tamen zai da dishang shezhi [chongbai] de zhuzai neng shi sizhe fuhuo ma?
Chu an la wai, jiaru tiandi jian hai you qita ying shou chongbai de zhuzai, name, tiandi biding huimiele. Zanmei an la——baozuo zhi zhu chaojue [zhu]! Ta chaojue yu tamen suo wangyan de.
Ta [an la] suo zuo de shi bu shou zewen de, er tamen [suo zuo de] que shi yao shoushen wen de.

Nandao tamen yao she ta er xuan bai qita zhuzai ma? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen na chu nimen de zhengju lai ba! Zhe [“gulanjing”] shi dui wo de tongdao de tixing [gaojie], yeshi dui wo zhiqian de renmen de tixing [gaojie].” Dan tamen da duoshu ren haishi buming zhenli, yin'er beiqi ta.
